known_issues: Deployment/publish issue: app not publishing successfully to production, backend canister connection errors on booking form

existing_features.title: Fix the backend canister connection so that the booking form on the Contact page successfully connects to the backend without showing 'Still connecting to the server. Please wait a moment and try again.' errors.

Add retry logic and a user-friendly loading state to the booking form so that if the backend canister takes a moment to warm up after deployment, the form gracefully retries the connection and shows a friendly loading indicator instead of an error.
